metadata.description: This rule set contains the recommended actions for the migration of the devon4j modules.

hint.title: Partially usable. Packages user and config contain integrations of the Spring framework.
hint.message: Partially usable. Packages user and config contain integrations of the Spring framework.

hint.title: Devon4j http modules must be replaced with the quarkus REST client. https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-web
hint.message: Devon4j http modules must be replaced with the quarkus REST client. https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-web

hint.title: Devon4j module security must be replaced with Quarkus security extension.
hint.message: Devon4j module security must be replaced with Quarkus security extension.

hint.title: Devon4j JPA modules must be replaced by a Quarkus JPA extension or by the vanilla spring-data module. The devon4j-project recommend the use of vanilla spring-data.
hint.message: Devon4j JPA modules must be replaced by a Quarkus JPA extension or by the vanilla spring-data module. The devon4j-project recommend the use of vanilla spring-data.

hint.title: Devon4j beanmapping modules must be replaced by MapStruct. https://github.com/devonfw/devon4j/blob/master/documentation/quarkus/guide-beanmapping-quarkus.asciidoc
hint.message: Devon4j beanmapping modules must be replaced by MapStruct. https://github.com/devonfw/devon4j/blob/master/documentation/quarkus/guide-beanmapping-quarkus.asciidoc
